title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Eddie: PART 1
itunes:title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Eddie: PART 1
description:
The Best Bits podcast is now officially separated into two podcasts!! This part of the podcast is the version you all have been wanting as a stand-alone, Morgan and a guest having their in-depth conversations without any interruptions. In this podcast you’ll hear Morgan and Eddie talk about all their comforts from foods to movies to activities. They share some more crazy talents and collections they have + their favorite sad girl jam. Eddie has tickets to see his favorite artist this year, and Morgan shared the crazy invention idea she wants someone to make.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
